timeline.message:
Refactors the way that "matching jobs" are determined.

We now also forward the "page" uri so that the path and the query string are accessible.
Calls the proper methods from within the templates which render matching jobs.
Completes the "matching jobs" refactoring by updating all jobs.

Removes a reference to a missing i18n key.

This isn't needed as the parameter is hidden anyway.
Merge branch 'aha/better-matching-jobs' of https://github.com/scireum/sirius-biz into aha/better-matching-jobs
